website_summaries.verdict: A convenient and functional 2-piece makeup organizer with plenty of space for your favorite cosmetics. Offers excellent value considering the size and quality.
pros: Drawers are completely removable for easy access, and feature large handles
Removable black mesh padding keeps the bottom of the drawers free from scratches

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is AMAZING!!!! I love it so much. It holds a lot of makeup. The only thing I don't like is that it doesn't hold my Morphe palettes but I'm okay with that. I'm using a magazine holder for those. Other than that I would totally recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah adcock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!! Does exactly what I want it to do. The top doesn't loosely sit on the top, there is a ridge so it is semi-secure. It comes with black removable padding and the drawers do come all the way out. You cannot flip it upside down due to how the drawers slide in the the small ridge intop to hold the top piece. The bigger drawers will come out and stop at a slant and my makeup does roll to the front, but I am okay with that. (Last picture)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Just about perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great investment for me! It’s quite a bit larger than I expected, which is great. I’ve had makeup storage problems for years as my collection has grown, and this organizer has solved most of them. The color is gorgeous and matches the color scheme of my vanity perfectly. The only thing I would possibly change is to make the drawers a bit deeper for larger makeup palettes, but that’s a minor complaint and I’m incredibly happy with the set. It’s a bargain, especially considering how many smaller, lower-quality acrylic organizers are sold at even higher prices.
customer_reviews.author: Emmalyne Braswell

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed - cracked on its own
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea of this and it was a great find, great price and I've read all types of great reviews, HOWEVER what started as a small crack (which I didn't cause) has turned into a huge mess... I did not drop it, nor hit it with anything. It just started crumbling (see photos). I usually would return/exchange via Amazon, but the return window for this product is only 30 days. I will not be buying this again :-(
customer_reviews.author: GailFlower

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening there was a chip in the plastic. I ignored that but sorry I did. After 3 days the runner on the drawer came apart. This was not a quality product and I do not use these things carelessly. I needed these dimensions and this particular design but I don't think it will last long if it keeps cropping up with broken pieces. I don't like negative reviews but the seller can't fix what is wrong if they don't know the facts. Liz
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Makeup Storage Box
customer_reviews.text: I was shopping around for a box to keep my makeup in and was surprised by how expensive the acrylic boxes are. They go for around $200 in Sephora, Boxygirl, etc. I ended up picking this one and I'm so glad I did! I love that it's clear so I can see where everything is. The box is sturdy, well built and it holds just about everything. I wish it was a little bit bigger or that it had another drawer because I wasn't able to fit all of my lipsticks, but that's not a big deal. Overall I'm really Happy with this! And it was only $30!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Ample storage yet light to move from one spot to another
customer_reviews.text: Loooooooove love love this makeup organizer. Pictures online don’t do it justice. It is big enough to store a lot of your everyday makeup but still not so big that it looks obnoxious on the bathroom counter or on your makeup vanity. It holds A LOT of products and it doesn’t hurt that it’s pretty to look at. I got it in pink but for those who love safer colors this pink isn’t in your face it’s more like clear with a wash of pink. Get it if you’re in the market for an everyday makeup organizer of you don’t have a large collection and you won’t regret your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Flygirl

customer_reviews.title: ... daughter ordered this with her own money and was disappointed when the package arrived today
customer_reviews.text: My daughter ordered this with her own money and was disappointed when the package arrived today. The package arrived in a heavily damaged and recycled box. The box had layers of tape, several old torn-off packaging stickers, holes, etc. It looked like someone threw the product pieces in a box from the dumpster and shipped it. Product was dusty and dirty. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine smith

customer_reviews.title: Wish it didnt come out of shape
customer_reviews.text: It came pretty warped the drawers didnt fit because a couple are like bent out of shape. Like it came un even i suppose is the best description. Other than that its okay.
customer_reviews.author: jade

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my mom, perfect because she is so unorganized. As I came in the mail, me, thinking it was going to be fine, wrapped it all up. Until, Christmas come & my mom opens it and she takes it out, falls in love w it until she looks at the corner and it was completely broken. It was also missing the top part where the lipsticks goes. Now, I am positive the producer didn’t do it, but maybe it needs to come packaged better to prevent that. But overall when I saw the rest of it, it was good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it and then not so much
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this product and filled it with my make up, I loved it. But now after a little under a year of having it, it has cracks all over it. The plastic itself isn't actually broken but there are all these little crack lines running all over it. I'm not sure why this is since it is simply sitting on a shelf with make-up in it - which is it's intended use. I'm very disappointed especially since I loved this so much at one point.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Smith

customer_reviews.title: Ok I guess
customer_reviews.text: Came in broken tried to get a hold of seller and no good I’m stuck with this oh well product looks super nice.
customer_reviews.author: Juan S.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!  Great size, perfect organization for mountains of makeup!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today and just finished organizing my haul of makeup inside of it. As you can see, my Naked palettes fit inside the generous drawers which is a real plus!! My makeup has been rolling around inside my vanity drawers for years and it finally got to the point of “help” I can’t find anything!!! This took care of that! I’ve set it up so each drawer contains similar items, I.e. mascara & eyeliner drawer, blush & highlighter drawer, eyebrow drawer, powder & primer drawer, etc. The lipstick slots are generous, the top piece is removable which will be great for cleaning and dusting! I’m very pleased and think you will be too! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Link

customer_reviews.title: Cracked
customer_reviews.text: Loved this when I first got it however I noticed a few months in that a crack was working its way up from the bottom now the whole thing is in pieces not worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: RQ0424

customer_reviews.title: Not enough space
customer_reviews.text: So, this is cute and pretty inexpensive but it's quite a bit smaller than I expected. Some of my pallettes are too big for the drawers. Ones that are smaller than Morphe pallettes. There is very little brush space as well. Literally less than half my brushes fit. So if you're a makeup junkie like me, you'll most likely need more than one. They do sell just the drawers that will stack with to add so you could buy that to go with it but I'm going to need a whole nother one. Not bad for the price though because these usually sell for $90-$200.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Cola

customer_reviews.title: Almost zero complaints! Well made and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful tool for organizing makeup! I love it. Very pretty in person. My only complaints are that the little tray that sits on top doesn’t click in or anything. It merely perches on a teeny tiny ledge so it can be knocked off very easily. Also, as shown in my side picture, there’s quite a bit of unused space in that top tray. They could have made the little cubbies go down more or all the way to put in lipgloss, pencils, or whatever. They’re pretty shallow as it is for even lipsticks. Other than that it’s very useful and I’m so glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Jupandor

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased as a gift last Christmas and like another reviewer, the thing is cracking and pieces are falling off. It is like it is on a timed destruction or something. This has not been abused in any way, just storing lipsticks and other cosmetic containers. The cracks are random and not at any frequently accessed areas. I dont know where this was made but I have an idea. Amazon, you should require sellers to put country of origin in the description of their merchandise. I make several hundred purchases on Amazon each year and now seem to be having quality issues with items from foreign sources. Especially one in particular.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brose

customer_reviews.title: This is the Make-up Organizer you Want!
customer_reviews.text: I love this make-up organizer! I could not believe how inexpensive it was, because it is very well made! I wanted to wait awhile before reviewing it to see how it held up. It's been almost 2 months and I have not had one problem with it! And, this is the longest my make-up has stayed organized. I highly recommend. I purchased two! One with 4 small drawers and 3 large drawers. and one with 2 small drawers and 4 large drawers. Both have the same organizer on top. The color is awesome! Of course, I love pink--especially this soft pink. If you are looking for a make-up organizer this is the one!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: It is durable, & beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I love this makeup organizer. It is just the right size to place on dresser or sink. It holds almost everything, all but the really large eye shadow palettes. The color choices are great. My daughter saw it & wanted one too & they also love it. All 3 came in just a few days all in excellent shape. I then ordered a 4th. One & same thing. Here in a couple of days in great shape. The layout of the drawers is convenient. You can rearrange them as needed. Highly recommend this organizer for you and for gift giving.
customer_reviews.author: Dannielle Moores

customer_reviews.title: Makeup organizer
customer_reviews.text: Love this so far. It was delivered today on on September 24, 2019 and so far it is able to hold all of my makeup product with ease. It was easy to put together since it arrived in the bod assembled and my four Year old daughter helped me to place makeup into the organizer. We had a blast. So far it seems to be sturdy and it looks amazing sitting on my bathroom counter. The transparency of it help a to make it blend in with almost any decor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I wasnt sure what to expect. I expected it to be small and feel cheap. I was blown away when I opened the box! It fit all of my foundation and primers plus more. It came with liners and the color (black) didn't look cheap or like it was made for a children's play set. I ordered another one before I was even done setting the first one up. I love that there are additional options for the drawers and the top comes off from the drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Cruz

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this for each of my friends
customer_reviews.text: This is just the most cleaver makeup holder, clear so I can see everything without having to open each drawer, it is attractive and the various spaces are terrific, lastly it was reasonably priced and there was NO assembly. I am a very diligent shopper and this was the best one on Amazon and I will buy it for gifts. It could be more efficient if I labeled each drawer, just the only improvement I can easily do it myself, because preprinted labels aren’t the solution as everyone I know calls an item by many different names.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Rosacker

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, but a bit small!
customer_reviews.text: I received this cosmetics case as a gift for Mother's day. I like the color, I chose the pink one since there were many negative reviews about the clear one. My case has a tiny crack on the third drawer from top to bottom, but it's really small. I hope that tiny crack doesn't ruin the entire case. The material is not as strong as other acrylic cases I have, but it will do its job. If you have lots of makeup, this case is small for that. Overall, I like the case to keep my makeup organize, the top part is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Purple, purple, purple . . .
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed. I had so many different products and nowhere to put them. I was able to fill this up in no time. I wonder where so many products came from. I really can't speak to the durability because I have only had it for about two weeks but for what I'm using it for, I expect that it will last a very long time. The material is a very hard plastic which seems like it will hold up to day to day use. The most important thing is that I was able to get it in purple.
customer_reviews.author: Red Geranium

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!! ...But
customer_reviews.text: While I’d give the product itself 5 stars because it’s amazing (and larger than I had anticipated, so that was a pleasant surprise since I have a lot of makeup), I’m taking a star away for the usage of UPS to ship. The box came completely missing a corner, including the styrofoam layer inside. The item was completely exposed, and I was really surprised it wasn’t cracked or broken when I opened it. So I highly suggest better shipping, but love the product itself.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Love this item, except...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to be able to give this item five stars but can't. I have had this case less than a year and already one of the drawers has developed quite a stress crack. All of the other drawers are just fine...for now. The case certainly meets my needs and holds my makeup items neatly organized and handy. It has a small enough footprint that it doesn't take up much space on my makeup table. But I certainly didn't expect to have issues with stress cracks. It would be nice if I could get a replacement drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Lee Carter

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I use this for makeup because I subscribe to a monthly service that sends me products every month and needed an easy way to find them. It holds way more than I expected and it heavy duty plastic that still allows the drawers to open easily. I love it so much I’m ordering a second one for me, and my daughter begged me for one for her. It does not fit my large eyeshadow pallets but that is not a deal breaker for me, I just stand them up behind it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H.

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I expected, looks nice, good quality
customer_reviews.text: I used a tape measure when I got it and measured to make sure it fit. It did and everything was accurate but even though I measured it just seems bigger than I was expecting. The quality is good. I was unsure if I should have choose the clear, the blue, or the black tinted box. I ended up with the black so it's a little bit more discrete and cluttered looking. I'm glad I did, it looks great and helps contain my makeup messes.
customer_reviews.author: Tina R

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet effective make-up organizer
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to organize my make-up and beauty supplies (e.g. palettes, brushes, lipsticks, beauty blender etc.) I am very pleased with my purpose for the following reasons - the shelves have ample space horizontally and vertically to fit long eye-shadow palettes, and even room for some blushers - the clear design makes it easier to find items, and overall looks very chic - the inside of the drawers come with padding / liners (not sure what their name is) so when you place your things there is no slip - the upper compartment and the lower compartment composing of drawers is separable, allowing flexibility but looks good placed on top of each other
customer_reviews.author: NilyaElma

customer_reviews.title: Not for bulky makeup; amazing storage box
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these! Sturdy, holds more than you think, but has limitations. If you have a ton of eyeshadow palettes that are larger (think Urban Decay, etc), this may not be the best storage solution for you. If you have bulky palettes, this isn't for those. I personally have a lot of "sample", "travel", "mini" sized makeup because of monthly glam bags. This fact about my collection may also make this particular storage box a better choice for someone like me.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah N. Burnette

customer_reviews.title: Very Fargile & has Cracks
customer_reviews.text: This storage makeup case was very fragile. I installed it and everything seem fine, no scratches and it was in perfect condition. I put some very light items on the top area and writhing 2 weeks it started to crack. I was very careful with it and I’m so upset that it only lasted me 2 weeks. This was a waste of time and I wish I could return it. I guess all the good reviews are from ppl who had received it and wrote a comment on the first few days. Had I done that I would have rated it 5 stars but it is definitely not worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Just buy this. Just do it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a really, really frugal person. I like nice things but I will not ever be ripped off and I need whatever it is to do whatever it does well and also look good doing it. This was more than I wanted to spend but now I don't know what I was thinking. Worth every penny. My makeup has never been so happy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING, STURDY, AFFORDABLE, BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: This makeup storage organizer is one of my favorite amazon purchases! I bought it for my sister and was so envious I had to get one for myself! All of my makeup fits perfectly! I originally had my makeup store in baskets. This organizer makes everything easier to find and it looks so much nicer and cleaner! The color is beautiful and the entire organizer is very sturdy for the price! I very highly recommend this organizer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Haebel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this item. It's very big, but still compact enough to fit on my bathroom counter. The picture doesn't show it, but each drawer is lined with a velvet black liner to keep things from sliding all around. I got the pink, and it is super cute. The top part that has the lipstick holder is detachable and can be placed either on top of or next to the stacked drawers. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Makeup storage transformation
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to reorganize my explosion of makeup and replace the mishmash of containers I'd cobbled together. The size and quality is perfect, and my makeup takes up less than half the space it did before. I'm able to fit all my pallets of various sizes within the drawers. The divided container on the top would be improved if the sections were a bit deeper. I didn't like the way my brushes fell to the side, so I'm storing them in another holder. Overall, I'm satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Sly

customer_reviews.title: Cute but beware
customer_reviews.text: I have had this organizer for a couple of months and I really like it but recently it cracked without impact or anything.(the top part). It's really cute and holds everything well so that top cracking makes me sad because it will definitely have to be replaced now. It sits on my dresser and no one has touched it. Very minimal amount of items in it. Not sure why it broke on it's own. Some others have reported this issue so I think it may just be a manufacturing issue. But I do love this organizer.
customer_reviews.author: WideEyedGenius

customer_reviews.title: Looks great,  conceals  smudges/dirt
customer_reviews.text: Love the glitter. Also let’s you go longer in between cleaning than the all clear type that shows every little thing. Large enough drawers my bronzer and larger items fit nicely. Being organized Equals quicker out the door for work. My bathroom is VERY small so the item made a huge difference in how much nicer it looks. My makeup, lotions & potions all fit. There is an even bigger drawer one if needed I think. I am pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE MONEY! AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: After years of storing my makeup in various bags, containers etc I finally decided to get it together and put it in one place. This storage unit is amazing!! It’s great quality- already assembled. Comes with removable mats for each drawer. I can fit all my naked urban decay pallets in the drawers along with some Tarte pallets. I love it!! Only thing I underestimated how much makeup I have and now I need more drawers!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: HECK YES
customer_reviews.text: OK SO: this organizer saved my life. I’m no MUA, but I’m obsessed with makeup. As you can see, my former makeup box was a WRECK. I had no where to put my makeup and everything was just unorganized and gross looking. It’s sleek, cute, and really helped me get rid of the pile that was on my bedroom floor. My bedroom is space themed, purple and black, and this fit perfectly with the aesthetic too. 100% RECOMMEND (p.s. you can see that larger palettes (typical morphe sized ones) won’t fit in here!! Also ignore my swatches on my hand i was decluttering as i was organizing!!)
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this organizer. I have my entire beauty and hair routine in this on my bathroom counter now. The top portion can even hold essential oil bottles and vitamins. The crystal baby blue color is phenomenal and exactly as pictured. The acrylic material is sturdy, unscratched and impressive. I have never seen anything like this in a store and it was such a great deal at around $30. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: S. Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It fits all my everyday stuff plus more in drawers on it. It’s not as big as it looks, but that turned out to work great for me! I love how the drawers are not super wide since most makeup products are smaller. I looked at the cheaper options of make up organizers on amazon but I’m glad I got this one!! Ooo, plus each drawer has a little grippy fabric for The bottom. Great product and I think my friend is now gunna buy one after she saw mine. Makeup takes way less time when it is organized!
customer_reviews.author: Meagster

customer_reviews.title: best investment for organization
customer_reviews.text: I only got this product as we temporarily (1 yr) moved from a large house to an apt in the city, so all space saving ideas welcome ;) I will forever use this for my makeup organizer. It is the best investment ever. I didn't even realize how much product i have, and this simply keeps it so organized and makes my getting ready faster, believe it or not...... easy for me to return items to their right place, keeping the bathroom counter free of a mess. I just take out one drawer at a time as i make up my face. LOVE thiS> don't know why I never considered it before.
customer_reviews.author: Caribare

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!! Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the best thing to ever happen to my bathroom. I posted a before pic of all my unorganized crap when I had no idea where anything was. This cosmetics organizer not only fit all of my stuff (well ok I threw half of it out while cleaning) but it also inspired me to clean the whole shelf! The material is sturdy, it comes with little black drawer linings, and being see through is great cuz you can see inside (I lined up all my lipsticks in one of the drawers and it looks like store quality lipstick placement now lol). Really amazing product, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected, but quite useful
customer_reviews.text: It was smaller than I expected. I thought I'd be able to fit my palettes in side by side, but the drawers don't go back far enough. I can fit them in parallel to the drawer, though, and the drawers are tall enough to stack 2-3 palettes on top of each other. A piece of plastic fell out when I opened it, but so far I can't find what it broke off of. It certainly still functions.
customer_reviews.author: Sdbic

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeded my expectations. It's bigger than I hoped and holds so much. The storage in it is great. My only complaint is that the drawers dont open super smoothly, but honestly, it doesnt bother me enough to take a star away. I wish I'd bought this sooner and stopped bottles falling out of my bath cabinet for so long!
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect makeup organizer. Tons of space for everything. The handles can be a little difficult the grab, but the drawers slide nicely. My only real complaint is that they put a huge sticker across the top of it that was difficult to remove. I ended up having to use a razor to scrape off the sticker, which of course scratched the surface some. Not noticeable once all put together and filled up, but still disappointing to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: broadwaywftx

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for makeup
customer_reviews.text: After months of use, I recommend this organizer. Drawers are roomier than expected and glide open easily. The clear acrylic makes it so easy to see what you need. The base is very stable. It is especially good for makeup, as the dimensions of the various slots and drawers are very compatible with average-sized lipsticks, liners, etc. Recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D. Carrell

customer_reviews.title: LOTS of storage, just needs more tall spaces
customer_reviews.text: Would prefer the row behind the lipstick slots to be sized for more tall items, but other than that it's really helped corral my makeup items (opted to get a different basket for my lippies as I use a bunch of them too frequently to dig around in drawers for). The drawers hold my masks and lesser used lotions and samples.
customer_reviews.author: ~heavv~

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: My makeup vanity table was looking way too messy. I had tons of makeup scattered everywhere so it was hard trying to find my makeup everyday. Finally decided I needed a makeup storage and bought this one. It was better than I expected! Very sturdy, organized all my eyeliners, eyeshadows, powders, blushers, bronzers, and lip stuff all in one. I have a white makeup vanity desk so it looks really pretty together. I love how it has the little handles so it's easy to pull out the drawers. Now I can see everything I have without having to open all the drawers!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Walking into my bathroom and doing my makeup is fun again.
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars!!! I LOVE this!! I have a ton of products, and not much counter space, and when I was finished putting them away this made me feel like I didn’t have so many (lots of storage) which meant... it was ok to go buy more right?! I bought the glitter one and I’m so glad I did. It’s pretty and and it doesn’t look cheap. The top compartment comes off which is super cool. I’m just so happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: I loved this makeup case
customer_reviews.text: I loved this makeup case! of course it didn’t fit all my makeup because i am a makeup hoarder but it organized my makeup beautiful and the drawers are removeable and you can unstack them so they are easy to organize. they also have a lot of space and are easy to pull in and out. arrived packaged very well and safely. was able to fit 10 mascaras in the top right drawer!! if you have a liberal amount of makeup, this organizer would be perfect for you, if you have a lot of makeup, order two or three.
customer_reviews.author: Samar Wahba

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a good organizer.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it works well. The handles are small and hard to grasp. My larger eye shadow palettes don't fit in the large drawers (they're slightly longer than the drawers), but fortunately I only have 2 so I'll keep them elsewhere. The individual holes up top are larger than your average concealer or mascara tubes, so they sit very loosely in there. I have a tin bucket from Target that I use in the large space up top to corral brushes and liquid eyeliner, with less frequently used liners behind it. I like that it fits in my window sill (I bought it to replace a smaller, similar organizer I'd had for years which was starting to crack).
customer_reviews.author: St. Louis Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This storage container is wonderful it has freed up my bathroom drawer of my makeup so it’s actually useful again. If you’d like to see what it can hold check out the video. I tried to show the different types of things it can hold both by size and thickness but also product names. I don’t talk throughout the video so you can draw your own conclusions about what you see. Hope this helps. It is a well made product and I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kdj945

customer_reviews.title: Perfect organizer. Love the color!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pretty makeup organizer. It fit so well where I wanted it to. I have my “go to” makeup in the open top. It’s so convenient! I also put my everyday jewelry in one of the drawers. I looked for the perfect organizer at many of the local stores. I settled for something I wasn’t crazy about. I took it back when I found this on Amazon. It’s great! The price was right too! Thank you so much for such a lovely product. I’m so happy with it. Lightening quick delivery as well! You won’t regret this purchase if you decide to get it. I think you’re going to love it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda K.

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: It came well packaged with plenty of molded styrofoam around it. I love how spacious the drawers are and the rose gold glitter. I was able to organize most of my nail art supplies in it. I'll be purchasing a second for the rest of my tools.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Y.

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great for the price point
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty much as advertised. My 4 stars is because the top plastic lipstick holders are a bit short in height for taller lipsticks and the price point is a bit high for some plastic drawers.
customer_reviews.author: deehunny

customer_reviews.title: Biggest Makeup Case on the Market
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a Christmas gift for my make-up obsessed best friend 3 years ago, and she still uses it as her main organizer. She used to have her makeup all over her bathroom counter, her nightstand, and her desk. Now she has a designated spot to organize everything, and can't be happier with the quality. It was very nicely packaged and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Chipped on corner but overall what i needed
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with the space! It fit my bigger eye shadow palettes, super awesome. I wad worried it wouldn't fit all my makeup but there's plenty of space for more. It's a pretty color and looks so nice and neat on my drawer. My makeup was all over a bag before and some was ruined and broken from not being stored correctly, so that's rectified. It did arrive chipped in one corner.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Margaret Verdugo

customer_reviews.title: Love the purple! How could you not?
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sister-in-law! She’s in cosmetology school, and was running out of room for places to put her makeup! She didn’t have a lot of room left to put anything anywhere, but this was the perfect size !! It came quickly, didn’t cost too much! And she ADORED the purple(: will be looking in the future for different organizational items!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Seip

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Space
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two cosmetic towers from two different companies and this is far better than the other one. I've only had it for a couple of days but, looking at the two together, this one has deeper drawers, they are longer as well. This is great for lip glosses, blukier items, and stacking. I highly recommend this brand over the other options listed on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Austey

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters 15th birthday. This was the only one I could find that was just the right size/capacity and aesthetic. The regular clear clear ones she didn’t want. It was delivered quickly and on time. When my daughter opened it, she was very pleased. It was a sturdy, very nicely designed high quality product. I was worried it would look cheap, but it looks very nice. She immediately put her makeup in it and is still excited about it. I would definitely purchase another product from this seller when the need arises in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great, however. . .
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect size for all of my makeup. Overall, it's an AMAZING product. However, the top part arrived broken. I hate returning things and really needed storage for my makeup so I decided not to complete the return process. If it appeared to be broken in delivery I would not even mention it, but the box was in fine condition and the cosmetic box was broken inside the plastic wrapping. I doubt it's a common issue and the price is very very good especially for the otherwise quality of the product--the main portion seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Holds a good amount of makeup
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking at a lot of different makeup organizers for awhile. I was sick of having my makeup exposed on my bureau because sometimes it starts to get dusty when it’s not something I use daily. This is a great way to keep it from getting dusty and keeping it organized. I love it! I have the purple tinted organizer and it’s so pretty. I like that it came with little drawer liners too. It holds a lot of makeup and even has room for a bunch of makeup pallets that I use. I am very happy with my purchase and might buy another in the future if I need to. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Masanis

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing
customer_reviews.text: I use this for storing all things cosmetics, including hair accessories. The larger drawers are not deep enough for most jarred creams but no matter. I was able to organize, consolidate and now see all my make up (sometimes I forget what I have when things are hidden away). Looks nice. Allowed me to use bathroom drawers for other things. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: mmorris

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought the one in purple after seeing a makeup organizer on a QVC site similar to this but more expensive. I'm so happy I went with this one. It doesn't feel like flimsy plastic, feels durable, and looks very stylish and not cheap. Plus it was able to store way more than I thought it could. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jada

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This has made my makeup routine much more enjoyable without having to dig through a tray or bag and easy to keep organized as everything has a place. Must buy! I have since taken the top portion off to keep the area more neat. You could also store the whole thing under ur bathroom sink and put small items like lotion samples and tampons in.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stores A Lot
customer_reviews.text: I really love this container. I plan on expanding my collection and this is perfect for storing my current and future products. It already came built and ready to use. The only thing that I do not like is that I cannot leave the drawer open to a certain point and expect it to hold up on its own. It can get annoying but I just put my everyday products in the bottom drawer. Other than that it is a very useful product for a good price and would still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lupe

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great seller, outstanding price!
customer_reviews.text: The description of this item is exactly what I received - it met my expectations 100%. The HUGE bonus was the price! Compared to other similar products (and before purchasing I compared and compared, and then compared some more), this was fabulous find. Similar products, especially those with the larger drawers, were far more expensive. I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey A.

customer_reviews.title: Your husband will love you
customer_reviews.text: My husband is soooo grateful that I chose this item. I am a bit of a makeup collector and not much for organizing. This has so much more room than I realized with the deep drawers. It’s doesn’t feel cheap and flimsy. The copper reflective color goes well with my granite counter. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Reads A Book

customer_reviews.title: You need this in your life
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh this is amazing. I was expecting something that was not going to be able to fit everything in it. HOWEVER.. the drawers are super deep and can hold a lot of items. There were no scratches or stickers to peel off and i liked that it came pre assembled, all I had to do was put the mesh in the drawers. It would be nice if they had little grips to keep them from moving, but i added that and it wasn't hard at all. The brush holders could be a little bit bigger but other than that no complaints, im sure my boyfriend is happy that my makeup isn't everywhere
customer_reviews.author: elisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for in my bedroom
customer_reviews.text: This has made it so much easier to see all my makeup and have it organized. Before i wasn’t using half of my makeup because I couldn’t see/get to the bottom of the bag. Now i have everything organized so if I was eye shadow I just open the eye shadow drawer and I haven’t been using more of a variety. I think it looks nice in my room too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in December and it is falling apart already. Started with one crack and now it is cracked all over. It was a Super cute organizer. Perfect size, color as shown.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Day

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. Pretty, compact and highly functional with enough room for all of my makeup, including multiple large pallets! I like how the top portion is removable and holds plenty of tubes like mascara, lip gloss and lip balm, etc. When you separate the top half, it leaves room to place lotions and perfumes on the top of the drawers. Love this and I’m not easily impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Petite and Pampered Boutique

customer_reviews.title: Fits more makeup then expected!
customer_reviews.text: I just recently purchased this product and I have to say it’s great. It fits a lot of makeup. Although there isn’t much room for brushes I just use a different container for those. My pallets fit too. Does not take up too much space since it’s more height than width. I have room to add more items. Easy to clean if needed. And it looks pretty😊I purchased the one with 4 large drawers and 2 small.
customer_reviews.author: Tashee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: You could fit 6 pallets that are the size of a ‘Naked 2’ pallet per large drawer. My Clinique loose powder juuust fits. The liners that come with it are a smidge too big so I trimmed them down. Everything came already assembled and securely packaged. The only thing that I don’t like is that the large drawers sit on a little ledge instead of having acrylic all the way across- completely dividing the sections. The drawer will fall out when you open it if the drawer above it is removed. Other than that it seems pretty perfect
customer_reviews.author: Catv

customer_reviews.title: i love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really love it. My problem was with amazon, it did not come the day it was supposed to and it came in the evening the next day. I had to wait at work for 3 and a half hours for the delivery because my pick up location is at work and I live about 45 minutes away and did not want to have to come back because it was a gift for someone. I am a prime customer, I pay my membership so that I can receive my items on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great, Lots of Storage
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking storage solution, for a really great price. There are black spongy liners, that you can use or not. The different sized drawers are good for different item. The only thing I don't love are the tons of lipstick holders on the top. Does anyone keep their lipsticks with the rest of their makeup? I think most women keep lipsticks with them, to reapply during the day. This space would be better used for taller vertical storage for makeup brushes, or open space like the left side. The drawers are deeper than some other models, which makes them more versatile. A great piece!
customer_reviews.author: L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy and quite chic organizer. I like the way it comes with the pre-cut black liners for the bottom of the drawers. Surprisingly a lot of space that fits all my items with room leftover for adding to my collection. Overall, I would say this is a good buy and I am considering getting another.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Neat Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy a makeup storage unit although I'm fairly new to makeup because my collection was growing at a steady pace. The top section is best for storing lipsticks, nail polish, perfume, etc... this is because the depth of the compartments is quite shallow. This top section can also be removed fairly easily. My favorite things are the drawers which fit all my makeup except my eyeshadow palette. This storage case also comes with padding to place on the bottom of the drawers. Overall a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It has more space then I actually thought it would. It also looks nice on the bathroom counter top. Providing more space then my bulky makeup cases. I also love the non slip pad added to keep everything in its place instead of rolling around. I would definitely recommend this product. I have had complements on how nice and organized everything was.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Functional, space saving and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: It came very well packaged with styrofoam inserts and plastic wrap. There were no scratches and all drawers open nicely. It included black mesh thin pads to line all drawers. The very top piece is not secured so I may consider hot glueing it, if it’s a problem. I got this organizer for my daughter that will be going to college in fall and will be living in a dorm. We needed a space saver for her makeup that looked good and is functional. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Item - not just for makeup and jewelry!
customer_reviews.text: I use this item for craft supply storage on my desk. It's got lots of storage space with a small footprint. There was no assembly except to put the drawer liners in the drawers. Very sturdy; nice translucent color (I got purple) and holds LOTS of stuff. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: SheriLynn M. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, solid, plenty of storage (clear, 4 small drawers, 3 large drawers)
customer_reviews.text: It was MUCH heavier and sturdier than I anticipated (a good thing). I decided not to put the liners in the drawers (they include velvet black liners, nice but it blocks some of the prism effect that I actually really like). The drawers slide super easy and I can tell it’s going to be easy to clean. Bonus: so many light prisms/rainbows just by setting it in the window!
customer_reviews.author: Venus

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and tidies up my makeup clutter
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy I ordered this SORBUS makeup organizer. The color is very pretty and it holds what I have very well. If I had more makeup I'd need a second one and I will not hesitate to order again from this company. My package shipped and arrived quickly with no damage. It was well-packed and all the felt liners fit perfectly. Some reviewers had issues with their product being broken but this only seemed to be occurring with the clear version and I wanted color anyway. 5 stars would definitely recommend! Couldn't add photos
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely made.
customer_reviews.text: This makeup holder is so awesome. I am able to fit everything in it. It’s very well made and it looks so much better on my counter then all the makeup thrown everywhere. Lol I absolutely couldn’t find one thing wrong of that I would change. I would highly recommend this to keep your makeup organized.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Tall, Space Efficient, and Pretty
customer_reviews.text: This is such an essential piece of storage for me. Yes, I'm a makeup and skincare product collector. An over-collector, if such a thing exists. I've been eyeing this lovely storage case for a few months, but my bathroom counter was starting to look like WW III, so it was time to order it. I filled it up, but not as easily as any other storage accessory I've ever purchased. This thing is sturdy, and it has great space. It is tall enough that it easily fits on my countertop, but not so tall that I'm knocking it over. It won't be my last piece of storage from this line. I've already ordered another piece.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This will make putting my make up on so much easier. Before all my make up was in a bag and not very organized. I had to get it out from my cabinet and dig through stuff and it was over flowing. This holds quite a bit, all my make up plus room for more. It seems pretty well made too. It comes with little grippy liners to put on the bottom of each draw. You can also remove the top and stack it different if you like or leave it to the side.
customer_reviews.author: justbeth

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. No defects.  I love the light brown color. Nice organizer for cosmetics or jewelery.
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, a great product for organizing cosmetics. I can see it would be good for organizing jewelry as well. I keep it on top of my bathroom sink in the corner faced sideways. I love the padded drawers, that is really a plus. Very happy with the quality of this product. Best organizer I have used yet. A great idea!
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: She loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of her side of the bathroom vanity counter looking like a landfill, so I bought this storage case. She spent a good hour organizing and cleaning all her cosmetiphenalia, and now it looks much better. Lots of room in the case for everything, and it's very sturdy material. Think Pope-mobile windshield, this thing is bulletproof. Now the balance has shifted and I need to find a way to make my side of the vanity counter look similarly awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Howie

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of Space!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this holder! Plenty of drawers for my larger items and all my brushes and lipsticks fit Easily on top! Now everything is at my fingertips! The material is Very sturdy and the drawers slide smoothly. An added bonus, this came with drawer mats so that my things don't roll around! I was worried that not all my items would fit, but this holder is So roomy that all my things fit with a bit of room to spare!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Karaffa

customer_reviews.title: The boxes need much better wrapping in order for me to ever order another.
customer_reviews.text: I returned it within one day of receiving it. The box was crushed on one of the top corners. Return was simple. I’ve hesitated to order another because of all the problems people have had receiving broken makeup holders. Many with the same problems. Too bad because it would have met my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, thick acrylic case that came fully assembled. Unfortunately though, it didn't fit my vanity space. But instead of returning it, I gave it to a friend (to organize her paints and brushes). It was just too good of a deal for high quality to return.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Arp

customer_reviews.title: Great storage for day to day makeup!!! (probably not for a makeup artist!)
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this - it looks great, fits all of my makeup and is deep enough to hold a few palettes in the larger drawers (too faced, naked, etc), only doesn't fit my large Anastasia palette which is okay. It looks nice and feels decently sturdy, although I wouldn't be too rough with it. Great size and fits right on my bathroom counter in the middle (kind of like a center piece, so if you want something subtle I would look elsewhere).
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: The little drawers rest on a ridge for those wondering. The piece up top has a similar ridge, so it’s removable. I like the quality (compared to others her on amazon) and the fact that it brings the little pre-cut velvet pieces for the bottom of the drawers. It was packaged well encased in thick styrofoam. I def recommend it! It made applying makeup so easy and I stay organized.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice item, but the drawer space is smaller than I expected, so pay attention to the measurements to see if it would fit all of your makeup (the height of each drawer specifically). The only reason why I gave this item 4 stars instead of 5 is that the mechanism of the drawers is not as smooth when you pull them out or when you push them back in, so the whole piece does move a little when you go for one of the drawers. Otherwise, I like the liners, and it was sufficient for my makeup needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mer

customer_reviews.title: SMART buy !
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for my vanity and absolutely in love with how they look. They fit a ton of makeup and really got things organized. They're not flimsy and they were packaged wonderfully from Sorbus. Will be back for 2 more and will recommend to friends and family. Much cheaper than other organizer products out there as well. $$$
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Better than what you'll find at ulta!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this ♡ it holds a good majority of my makeup including enough room to fit a couple of palettes in (: I wish the lipstick organizer was a little bit taller so it doesn't feel like they will easily come out if accidentally hit or bumped against but overall it's fantastic. I will def buy some more as my collection expands ♡♡
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I needed an item like this because I make Jewelry. This is such a fabulous help to me.On the top is great for my steel rods and other pieces I use to make the Jewelry. I don't use this not to store my beads. The drawers are lined and this is a bonus to me!! Love this product, it is serving all my needs!! THANK YOU!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Perryman

customer_reviews.title: Never Knew I Needed!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I chose the glitter option! The colors are elegant and super cute! It satisfies the inner 90s girl in me. Looks aside, I had no idea how badly I needed this. I’m a performer and my vanity was constantly a disaster pre-show. Not anymore! This fits my makeup AND a few of my favorite costume jewelry pieces. It motivates me to stay organized. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Musical Mama

customer_reviews.title: Teal thrill - gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning!! I love it so much! & the color teal thrill.....b-e-a-utiful. I have bought 2 & am considering buying a 3rd. It holds a lot more than you would think. I am a little bummed that the small drawers are not just a little bigger...they fit my Huda Beauty 9 pan palettes, but not my ColourPop 9 pans. Still a major game changer for organization & maximizing space. Came in perfect condition both time. **knock on wood** (in case I get a 3rd) Fairly quick shipping. Wish the Teal thrill color stayed stocked as well as the other colors do though.
customer_reviews.author: JThompson

product_meta.title: Sorbus Cosmetic Makeup and Jewelry Storage Case Display - Spacious Design - Great for Bathroom, Dresser, Vanity and Countertop (4 Large, 2 Small Drawers, Clear)
feature_bullets: COSMETIC & MAKEUP STORAGE CASE (4 LARGE, 2 SMALL DRAWERS, 16 SLOTS, CLEAR) — Organize all your makeup, cosmetics, and accessories into a dazzling personalized beauty counter or display

SLEEK & STYLISH — Chic and elegant exterior — Clear style creates visually appealing display that coordinates beautifully with most décor — Great gift for any girl, teen, adult, beauty, fashion, and makeup lover

BEAUTIFULLY DISPLAY & STORE — Lipsticks, foundations, bronzers, blushes, eye shadows, primers, powders, etc — Can also be used to store jewelry, personal accessories, grooming tools, keepsakes, and much more — Storage case fits on most dressers, vanity desks, and countertops

FUNCTIONAL & CONVENIENT — Keep makeup and accessories organized and easily accessible — Reduce clutter, save time getting ready, and gain space — Convenient slot compartments on top level keeps items protected, upright, and in place

DURABLE & LONG-LASTING — Made of durable acrylic-like clear plastic — Includes 4 large drawers, 2 small drawers, and 16 slot compartments — Drawers slide open smoothly with easy grip handles — Can be used alone or to complement other organizers by Sorbus — Makeup NOT Included — Measures approximately 9.25” L x 6.25” W x 14.25” H (drawers 1.87” deep)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars7,793 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
